resources.description:
This dataset is derived from the Natural England site condition dataset but makes some assumptions. In particular: 
- that SSSI land that has not been assessed at any point is not falling below the standard and 
- that an acceptable standard is Favourable or Unfavourable - Recovering
resources.name: % area of SSSI in Herefordshire falling below "Unfavourable - recovering" per year since 2006

resources.description:
This table combines data from two reports from the Natural England data download: 
- one lists the date of the latest assessment on any part of a SSSI
- the other lists the background of each SSSI site including date of designation

It can be helpful to have both sets of data together in a  table but this does mean that some of the SSSI background data is repeated in this table
resources.name: Detail of SSSI Assessments including background on SSSI

resources.description: A simple reporting tool that provides information on the status of a range of site with statutory protection. It covers the whole of England but reports can easily be generated just for Herefordshire
resources.name: Natural England Designated Sites View

organization.description:
This is the community datastore for Herefordshire. [Here is a post about what the datastore is and why you should care](http://h-map.org.uk/2016/05/06/what-is-the-herefordshire-datastore-and-why-should/).


Part of the [Brightspace Foundation Route Map project](http://h-map.org.uk/).

We blog over at the [Route Map blog](http://h-map.org.uk/category/all-posts/).

If you'd like to add data here, you'll need a datahub.io account. Then [contact the RouteMap project](http://h-map.org.uk/contact-us/).
organization.title: Herefordshire
organization.name: hdata

name: sites-of-special-scientific-interest-in-herefordshire
notes: Natural England publishes data about Sites of Special Scientific Interest. Reports for Herefordshire can be run easily on the [Natural England site](https://designatedsites.naturalengland.org.uk). Data are presumed to be released under OGL (though no license is given on the site)
title: Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Herefordshire
